original_title: 43 ans, les nuits d'une femme mariée
overview: Since giving in to her sexual urges with the young Pablo and discovering that her husband, despite being very jealous, was regularly cheating on her with a woman half her age, Rebecca has decided to take her destiny into her own hands and let herself be guided by her desires. Together with her girlfriends, she decides to create a very special "club" for rich married women, with the real aim of luring in virile men and leading them into crazy group sex.
title: Married Woman: The Call of Lust
